course.subject: ENGG
course.name: Systems Design Engineering
course.description: Introductory course focusing on multidisciplinary design process (problem definition, life-cycle design, design specification, concept/design generation and evaluation, design for manufacturing and assembly), systems modelling and analysis, as well as human factors through user-centric industrial design. Instructor's consent is needed.

reviews.author: MSA
reviews.title: good journey anyway
reviews.comment_content: The content is good to let you have introduce you the fundamental concepts in systems design, and how to put theory in practice. The course is some-how project-based, you need to put what you have learnt in lesson in yr project.
reviews.comment_teaching: Teaching is good and detailed, Winnie is good!!
reviews.comment_grading: As this is a new course grading that is unclear, I got a B+ at the end.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload varies across semester, it only be easy if you follow the steps and advise tutor from time to time.
